donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project  aims to constitute a strong and functioning Human Rights Commission of Sierra Leone capable of carrying out its institutional function of promoting and protecting human rights and thereby creating a strong culture of respect for human rights and good governance in Sierra Leone

project_descr: CAPACITY BUILDING OF THE HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION OF SIERRA LEONE (HRCSL)
project_title: PBF- CAPACITY BUILDING OF HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION OF SL
